data.price: 6. Ee nagu hanuuni (oo sug) Jidka Toosan.

7. Jidka kuwaad u Nicmaysay2, aan aheyn 
(jidka) kuwa loo cadhooday3  iyo (jidka) kuwa lunsan midna4.
data.arabic: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غَيۡرِ ٱلۡمَغۡضُوبِ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
data.footnotes:
2. Kuwo Alle siiyey Galladdiisa waa Nabiyada, runlowyada, suubbanayaasha, iyo shuhadada. 
3. Kuwa uu Alle u cadhooday waa kuwa iyagoo u cilmi leh aan ku camal falin diinta ee diida xaqa, sida Yuhuudda iwm. 
4. Kuwa lunsan waa kuwo cilmi la’aan iska cibaadeysta iyagoo ku socda caqiidooyin gurracan sida Nasaarada iwm.

meta.transliteration: ṣirāṭa alladhīna anʿamta ʿalayhim ghayri al-maghḍūbi ʿalayhim walā al-ḍālīna

dua.name: Dua of Right Guidance
dua.significanceReason: Most repeated dua in daily prayers, seeking divine guidance and protection from misguided paths. Muslims recite this in every prayer, making it universally recognized and spiritually powerful.
